"A.P.238/4/2": "Hm? About the past? You want to hear about when Dark Falz first appeared?"
"I can tell you a little from what I learned about it in class."
"But I'm not very good at studying."
"So I can't guarantee it's completely accurate, but if that's okay then..."
"From what I can remember Dark Falz's name popped up twice."
"The war forty years ago and that incident from ten years ago."
"The battle forty years ago was when Dark Falz Elder was defeated."
"It looks like in retrospect, he wasn't defeated, only sealed."
"The three members who defeated him became the Three Hero's."
"Those three members collected the remaining ARKS and rebuilt the organization."
"That, and then ten years ago... I remember it personally..."
"When Darks Falz went on a large-scale offensive against ARKS."
"If I remember correctly, the second generation Claris Claes was able to fend him off."
"But she died in the battle, which is why the current Claris Claes is the third."
"There were a lot of deaths in the top of ARKS. It really was a tragedy."
"There's not telling just how many ships were destroyed in that attack."
"It wasn't just ARKS; there was a large number of civilian casualties too."
"My older sister disappeared in that attack as well."
"Sorry, it looks like I got side tracked!"
"Anyways, that's about the jist of it. Sorry if there are any holes in what I said."
"Compared to past events, it seems this encounter with Dark Falz didn't go too badly at all."
"People we knew were lost..."
"Well, Zeno hasn't exactly been confirmed dead though."
"That's right. He only disappeared. We need to hope for the best!"
